# Requirements

```{r}
#| eval: false
install.packages("targets")
install.packages("visNetwork")
install.packages("tidyverse")
```

# Targets Example

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(targets)
```

```{r}
tar_make()
```

```{r}
tar_visnetwork(callr_arguments = list(show = FALSE))
```


```{r}
tar_load(plot)
plot
```
